b'Lunn wa Kaze no Naka': b'This is the third episode in the Lion Books Series, in which a boy who has fallen in love with a girl on a poster on the wall starts to look for her. This story depicts the heartache of adolescent first love in a low-key manner.'
[b'Lion Books', b'Amefuri Kozou', b'Adachi-ga Hara', b'Yamatarou Kaeru', b'Midori no Neko', b'Akuemon']
